content: AP-D SPX Fiber disc Ultimate fiber discs with ceramic grain for rough to fine grinding of stainless steel, steel and other metals ### Categories: Home > Products > Tool inserts > Abrasives- - - ### FEATURES:Features Built with extremely long-lasting ceramic grains Temperature-regulating coating – helps to prevent sensitive metals such as stainless steel from overheating Smaller contact area – designed for your more precise metal grinding tasks Applications Rough to fine grinding of stainless steel, steel and other metals Removal of welds on stainless steel, steel and other metals Chamfering edges for weld preparation on stainless steel, steel and other metals Removing burrs from rough cuts on stainless steel, steel and other metals Cleaning rust or paint on stainless steel, steel and other metals ### TECHNICAL DATA: Arbor size: 22.2 mm Base material: Stainless steel, Steel Product Class: Ultimate Technical Data | Base material | Stainless steel, Steel | Product Class | Ultimate ### ITEMS- 2243218 - Fiber disc AP-D 115 P36-40 SPX - Package Size 25 pc - 2243216 - Fiber disc AP-D 115 P60 SPX - Package Size 25 pc - 2243251 - Fiber disc AP-D 125 P36-40 SPX - Package Size 25 pc
